verses.content: “Leviathan chu ngakuoiin i hnûk dawk thei ding am a nih? Annawleh, a lei chu hruiin i keihnuoi zo ding am a nih?
A hnâr chu hruihruolin i khit thei ding am a nih? Annawleh, a khâk chu thalin i suntlang thei ding am a nih?
I kuoma chun hninahai tamtak siemin, I kuoma chun thu innêmhai chu a hril ding am a nih?
Ama chu siehlawa kumkhuoa i nei zingna dingin, I kuoma chun thutiem a siem ding am a nih?
Vate inhnelpui angin ama chu în hnelpui ding am a nih? Annawleh, i rawngbâwltunu ta dingin ama chu i khit ding am a nih?
Ngamantuhai chun innêpnain an hmang ding am a nih? Sumdâwng mihai lai chun ama chu an sem dar dîm a nih?
A vun chu thîr kibar neiin i suksip thei ding am a nih? Annawleh, a lu chu ngakhâwfeihaiin?
Ama chunga chun i kut hei inlet hrim la. In inthaw dân chu hre zing i ta, Thaw nâwk ta ngai naw ti nih.
Ngai ta, ama hne în zuomna chu a thlâwn el a na, Ama hei hmu ngawt khawmin mi chu a beidawng nghâl el a nih.
Ama suktho ding khawpa huoisen tukhawm an um nawh a, Chuong a ni chun tu am keia hmaa ngir thei ding?
Ama ka pêk kîr nâwk dingin tuin am ka kuomah an pêk hmasa hlak a? Iengkim vânkhuphnuoia thil taphawt chu ka ta a nih.
A kehai hrâtzie chu hril thei bâk a nih, A tha hrâtzie a taksa muk ṭhat dân khawm chu.
A silfên chunghnung chu tuin am hâwk ngam a ta? Tuin am thîrse thuo hni hung insêdetir thei a ta?
Tu am a khâk chela a bau keika thei ding? A ha intlar kuol ṭhut chu ṭi a um sih a.
A vun char inuoi chu a suong tak a na, Chârde ang ela khawng rût chu,
Pakhat chun a dang a hnai hleh a, A kâra chun boruok hrim a lût dêr nawh.
An inṭingmat tuo tlat a, Kei ṭhe thei ruol a ni nawh.
Ân simhai chun var a suksuok a, A mithai chu vârṭien var ang el a nih.
A baua inthawk chun meiser chawklaihai a suok a, Meisihai chu a vuong suok bawk a.
A hnârkuoa inthawkin meikhu a suok a, Thil suongna bêl le hlobuk kâng ang elin.
A thuok chun meilinghai chu a mûtchawk a, A baua inthawk chun meichawk a suok a.
A rînga chun hrâtna a um a, A hmaa chun ṭiumna chu a lâm a.
A tisa hlawmhai chu ân zawm khâwm tlat a, A chunga chun ân nghat tlat a,sukchâng ruol an ni nawh.
A lung chu lung anga ngar a na, Anih, bu râwtna lung hnuoihnung ang elin.
Ama chu a hung tho pha chun, mi hrâthai chu an ṭih a: Ṭitna leiin anni chu an inhâwrkhâwm a.
Miin kâwlhnâmin sât sien khawm sât pawp naw nih, Annawleh, fei khawmin, thal khawmin, hmawlzum khawmin sun pawp naw nih.
Thîr chu bupâwl angin a ngai a, Dârsen chu thing hmawn angin.
Thalhai chun ama chu a suktlân thei nawh a, Saihlumhai khawm chu ama kuoma chun pâwlbul ang a nih.
Hmawlzumhai khawm chu pâwlbul ang chaua ngai a na, Fei inlap zawk zawkhai khawm chu a nuisan a.
A hnuoihrût tieng chu bekawihâr ngei ang an na, Dûm chirdiek chu buchilna hrizâwl angin a hrût cham duoi a;
Li inthûk chu bêl angin ân phultir a, Tuisuoriet chu thilhnâk angin a siem hlak.
A hnunga chun a fêna lampui chu a sukhuom vâr a, Li inthûk chu mi chun hmul vâr amani a sâwn rau khawpin.
Hnuoi chunga hin ama ang an um nawh a, Ṭitna nei loa siem chu.
Thil insâng tinrêng chu a hmuh a, Chapona naupahai po po chunga lal a nih,” tiin.
